DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study was to evaluate the effect of a dental water jet on initial peri-implant disease resolution.
DOC.brief_title: The Use of Water Jet for Initial Treatment FOR Peri-Implant Disease
DOC.detailed_description: Peri-implant disease is becoming more frequent during the last decade. Till today, there is no effective evidence-based treatment. The use of water-jet might improve those situations and reduce morbidity and implant loss.
DOC.criteria: Signed and dated Informed Consent Form. Patient suffer from peri implant disease Age Eligible for study: 18 year old and older Genders Eligible for study: Both Patient substantially fails to comply with the study schedule, or treatment program as described in this Protocol.
